main event: A flaming object struck the side of a house in Lawrence, Massachusetts on August 11, 1955, creating a hole and scorching the area upon impact.
interesting points: The object was described as reddish and several feet in diameter., The impact shattered a window and left evidence of burning on the clapboards., A witness, Mrs. Rickard, identified the object as a fiery ball with a tail of flame., The incident occurred shortly after 10 p.m., and the noise woke several nearby residents., The event is linked to other unexplained sightings in the area at the same time.
witness description: Mrs. Riza Descoteaux and Mrs. Rickard, a neighbor.
